name: Hackatron
about: A flagship hackathon challenging coders to solve real-life problems by developing innovative websites, apps, or desktop solutions.

name: Techathalon
about: Techathlon is a fast-paced, multi-round competition that pushes participants to demonstrate their coding prowess across diverse and challenging tasks. It is designed for skilled coders, software programmers, and developers who are eager to test their debugging, code optimization, and teamwork abilities. Techathlon consists of three sub-events: Bugspot, Code Golf Challenge, and Code-Relay. Each event highlights different aspects of coding expertise, from bug fixing to code brevity and collaborative problem-solving.

description.overview: Techathlon is a fast-paced, multi-round competition that pushes participants to demonstrate their coding prowess across diverse and challenging tasks. name: Capture the Flag (CTF)
about: An online cybersecurity competition where participants solve challenges to capture flags and accumulate points.

objective: Solve challenges to find and capture hidden flags.
